name: ChainsBall GMTK21
description:
This is my project for the GMTK 2021. 

A game called Chains-Ball. 

This game is all about creating lines (Or chains) to control a ball. 
But be aware, you have to make it on a timley manner! 


This is kind of a "POC" Since I didn't have much time to work on it. (Total of 8 hours I guess) 

Currently it features 4 levels with a "Proof of concept" mind instead of actual game play so I'm sorry for that .
